scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.build:web: npm run postcss:build && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./
scripts.deploy:contract: near deploy --accountId near-idea.testnet --seedPhrase 'shadow lamp sand matter tobacco bid shuffle clever broom provide clock word '
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:contract && npm run deploy:pages
scripts.dev:contract: npm run build:contract:debug && npm run dev:deploy:contract
scripts.dev:app: echo The app is starting! It will automatically open in your browser when ready && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel src/index.html --open
scripts.start: echo The app is starting! It will automatically open in your browser when ready && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel src/index.html --open
scripts.test: npm run build:contract:debug && cd contract && npm run test && cd .. && jest test --runInBand
